You are trying to start a fight on both accounts.
I stand by what I sent you. You can say whatever you like, but it’s not what you said below.
You are certainly confirming you decided that youbare the sole decision maker for our children.
To keep this peaceful, I am again stating I dont agree with either of your statements or assumptions.
I’ll also say one last time, we worked well together today. Now you are wasting both our time.

Christine.
